name: TAOTH - The Adventures of the Herkulez
description: A mouse controlled vertical scroller/shooter (with bonus mazes)
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo/AMD Athlon X2 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 8600 GT/AMD HD 3650 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse with mouse wheel
